svg.style: overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; touch-action: none; user-select: none; -webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ✅ 正确实现：按 Master Node 分组

span.p:
结果：~2000 个 slot groups
(每组平均 1 条命令)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
groupByNode()
1. 计算 slot = CRC16 % 16384
2. 查询 clusterTopology[slot] → masterAddr

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
结果：3 个 node groups
(每组平均 666 条命令)
